P

paintBackground(Graphics2D) - Method in class game.display.MyView
This method paints in the background image for the level.
paintForeground(Graphics2D) - Method in class game.display.MyView
This method paints a rectangle over the ground platform and colours it in appropriately based off the level theme.
pause() - Method in class game.levels.GameLevel
Pauses the world temporarily.
Platform - Class in game.entities
The Platform entity is one that the player can stand on.
Platform(World, Shape, float, float) - Constructor for class game.entities.Platform
 
Player - Class in game.entities
The Player object is the main entity in the game, and the one used by the player in the game
Player(World, JProgressBar) - Constructor for class game.entities.Player
The Player constructor initialises some base values, as well as populating the array of possible images and setting the first one.
PlayerScore - Class in game.display
PlayerScore is an entity used to display the players score without having it constantly updating every frame.
PlayerScore(Game) - Constructor for class game.display.PlayerScore
 
playSound(String) - Method in class game.entities.Player
Plays a sound effect for it's full length if audio is toggled on.
populate(Game) - Method in class game.levels.GameLevel
Creates a new player if none has been created before, and initialises their position as well as that of the ground and the bone.
populate(Game) - Method in class game.levels.LevelDebug

postStep(StepEvent) - Method in class game.display.Tracker
This method updates the x position of the view.
postStep(StepEvent) - Method in class game.entities.Bark
 
postStep(StepEvent) - Method in class game.entities.control.Controller
 
preStep(StepEvent) - Method in class game.display.Tracker
 
preStep(StepEvent) - Method in class game.entities.Bark
This method governs the amount of time a bark will propagate through the level before it destroys itself.
preStep(StepEvent) - Method in class game.entities.control.Controller
This method governs the time a bark image will go for and the interval between barks, as well as what image to update with after the bark time has finished.
